ShaderNodePreset.Description:
This Matchbox shader creates voronoi noises.
Setup:
- Octaves: Octaves for the noise - Type: variations of the noise pattern - Zoom : zoom in/out - Detail: add aditional noise
- Speed: animation speed - Offset: offsets the noise pattern
Demo clip: http://vimeo.com/84470508
Shader developer: Pietro De Nicola | denicola.pietro@gmail.com | blog: http://gdevice.blogspot.it
